CASE WHEN SIGN(($!s0s!$.customcurrency1__c+$!s0s!$.customcurrency2__c)) = SIGN(CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c >= 0 THEN ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0), $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) ELSE ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0)*POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c))/POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) END) THEN (CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c >= 0 THEN ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0), $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) ELSE ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0)*POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c))/POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) END - (FLOOR(CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c >= 0 THEN ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0), $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) ELSE ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0)*POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c))/POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) END/($!s0s!$.customcurrency1__c+$!s0s!$.customcurrency2__c)) * ($!s0s!$.customcurrency1__c+$!s0s!$.customcurrency2__c))) ELSE (CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c >= 0 THEN ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0), $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) ELSE ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0)*POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c))/POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) END - (CEIL(CASE WHEN $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c >= 0 THEN ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0), $!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) ELSE ROUND(($!s0s!$.custompercent1__c / 100.0)*POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c))/POWER(10,$!s0s!$.customnumber1__c) END/($!s0s!$.customcurrency1__c+$!s0s!$.customcurrency2__c)) * ($!s0s!$.customcurrency1__c+$!s0s!$.customcurrency2__c))) END
